entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JIT] x64 InitValueNumStoreStatics is 261k #85953
    8.0.0
  • Could not find chrome snapshot folder for Linux_x64 #85949
  • Memory usage reported by the process greatly mismatches the dump #85948
  • Readonly access of JsonObject with dynamic is not working #85943
  • [android] Mono AOT compiler fails in main/.NET 8 Preview 5 #85940
  • Polymorphic deserialization of a composite collection throws NullReferenceException #85934
  • [API Proposal]: KeySizes.IsValidSize #85931
    Future
  • Performance regression on Fortunes Windows #85930
  • [NativeAOT] consider using casting cache in GVMLookupForSlot scenario. #85927
  • [High Memory] Consumed approximately 300MB of additional memory with latest runtime docker image 6.0.16 #85924
  • Stack overflow exception thrown by `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` in a special case #85922
  • `Double.NegativeZero` is actually `+0.0` #85914
  • [API Proposal]: update API signatures to leverage ref readonly parameters #85911
  • [API Proposal]: RequiresLocationAttribute (supporting ref readonly parameters) #85910
    Future
  • Could IServiceProvider support modularlized applications? #85907
  • [NativeAOT] Missed devirtualization opportunities due to Unsafe.As #85906
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\Matrix4x4_ro\\Matrix4x4_ro.cmd #85899
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Windows service infrequently results in error 1067 on stop operation #62579
    8.0.0
  • GetDirectorySynchronizationCookie() returns empty cookie #49376
    Future
  • Edit and Continue for members of generic types #11036
    Future
  • Implement support for updating generic methods during EnC/Hot Reload #80749
    8.0.0
  • [Crossgen2] Fix RVA field access in composite mode #78723
    8.0.0
  • Failed to load libcoreclr.so on Raspberry Pi Zero 2W when running C# program using .NET Core Debugger (vsdbg) #85680
  • Repeated generation of same interface (name) causes InvalidCastException with DispatchProxy.Create #84755
  • Extract array of const to static readonly field #33794
    8.0.0
  • CA1416 Triggered even though platform validity check has been completed. #77902
  • JIT: more unexpected dynamic PGO schema mismatches #85856
    8.0.0
  • Proxy authentication seems to not work with proxies that are not Fiddler #82743
  • [wasm?] Mono interpreter vector argument alignment issue #85071
    8.0.0
  • ARM64 - Test failure `Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.sh` #85721
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.Compression: ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory: Provide overload for writing to stream #85822
  • Investigate getting rid of reflection blocking #72570
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0-staging] Improve Servicing Docs #85955
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Update class for Unsafe.As<>() #85954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid an assert if the class name table is too large. #85952
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert. #85950
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove Windows arm32 support #85947
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Fix Linux Musl Alpine Core Root build #85946
    area-Infrastructure
  • Save 240k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bug in jump threading #85942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PreserveSig support to ComInterfaceGenerator #85941
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add Base64.IsValid and allow Base64.DecodeXx methods to skip whitespace #85938
    area-System.Memory, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Disable IUnknownTest under GCStress #85937
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Disable foreground-shutdown test on Windows #85936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Exclude the test DevDiv_255294.cmd on Windows arm in issues.targets #85928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimizations for Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #85926
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete rarely used bashing methods and add some documentation on bashing #85925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #85923
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Allow set GC configuraiton in NativeAOT #85921
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and wasm packedsimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Attempt to bypass emscripten's generated wrappers for cwraps #85919
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • Add Ubuntu Kinetic 22.10 and Mantic 23.10 RIDs #85912
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Stop using ref counts in forward sub #85909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fixed errors in jit and unwinding #85900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Delete call to `GetMethod` in runtime type system #85902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [main] Servicing docs improvements #85855
    area-Meta
  • Reorder the url lib install #85935
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • Ensure the insTupleType mask entries stay correct #85870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6" #85929
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update version of Python urllib3 #85915
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Speed up `GVMLookupForSlot` #85901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Add test for unnmanaged delegates interop #85903
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix RVA field access in composite Crossgen2 build (#78723) #85800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fetch interpreter opcode info from the runtime instead of generating a table #85904
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Prune opcodes in the jiterpreter if they follow an unconditional bailout/exit #85905
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [PERF] Pin urllib to version 1.26.15 for perf runs #85881
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: assert if we see schema mismatches with dynamic pgo data #85898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Get rid of reflection blocked types #85810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Update PropertyTabAttribute.Equals() nullability #85896
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Capture remaining binding methods for source generator support #85843
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    area-System.Runtime
  • Print out the script that the CI script is running #85624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fold "FrozenObjectHandle(REF) + CNS" to a byref constant #85888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unroll StringBuilder.Append for const string #85894
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Relax address exposure check for tailcalls #65102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
